words.tran_cn: 欲力投入的；精神集中发泄的

trans.tran_cn: 宣泄，情绪的抒发，导泻，感情（受艺术的作用而起的）净化
trans.tran_en: the act or process of removing strong or violent emotions by expressing them through writing, talking, acting etc
